room_title: Escape room "Area 51" by Brainstorm Escape Games in Atlanta
review: Seriously the best escape room ever! Area 51 is my favorite. Love this place.

room_title: Escape room "Area 51" by Brainstorm Escape Games in Atlanta
review: Great team building experience. Although we failed our mission in Area 51 and were taken over by the aliens, we still had fun! Owners and staff were friendly and accommodating.

room_title: Escape room "Area 51" by Brainstorm Escape Games in Atlanta
review: What a trip!! We loved figuring out our Area 51 escape room! I recommend this experience to a group of friends or a company team building exercise. It's absolutely great fun!

room_title: Escape room "Area 51" by Brainstorm Escape Games in Atlanta
review: OMG. So much fun. Great entertainment. The staff was fantastic from moment one. Helpful in every way. Thank goodness the aliens didn't take us back to the mothership. Can't wait for the catacombs. Great place to do work team building too.

room_title: Escape room "Area 51" by Brainstorm Escape Games in Atlanta
review: Came here with a group of 8 friends and we were lucky enough to get in right away. All of us had an amazing time working together to solve Area 51. We escaped with only 24 seconds left! The staff was helpful, informative and the video was a great icebreaker! We will be back again!
